cab.content: ) nMilitary Secret.This DociKTicnt -its tSrJtannib IVl?Property ct iDverniDCnl:.From Viceroy, Army Department, 9th August 1919.c)99th August. No. 90. Parti. -1. Situation normal. 2. Efforts are being made through Mullah Fazl Din to induce Waziris and Mahsuds to act collectively should punitive measures be taken against them by us,Part II. 3. Tribal parties harassed our road pickets yesterday between.een Biinmi and Mirarishah; we had no casualties All communicated to Press. Proposed for the present to send these telegrams bi-weekly only. Please telegraph if you agree.
